description: [``botocore``] This release introduces configurable clipboard, allowing admins to specify the maximum length of text that can be copied by the users from their device to the remote session and vice-versa.
[``botocore``] Add support for cluster insights, new EKS capability that surfaces potentially upgrade impacting issues.
[``botocore``] This release 1) introduces a new API: GetOrganizationStatistics , and 2) adds a new UsageStatisticType TOP_ACCOUNTS_BY_FEATURE for GetUsageStatistics API
[``botocore``] Adding Confirmation Status and Execution Status to GetTransaction Response.
[``botocore``] Adds the ability to configure time shifting on MediaTailor channels using the TimeShiftConfiguration field
[``botocore``] Amazon Route 53 now supports the Canada West (Calgary) Region (ca-west-1) for latency records, geoproximity records, and private DNS for Amazon VPCs in that region.
[``botocore``] Update endpoint-rules client to latest version
